vc.prottype: FWLIBAPI short WINAPI cnc_wrgrpinfo2(unsigned short FlibHndl, short length,IODBTGI2 *grpinfo2);

cmn.p: Write the tool group information. The following information can be modified.
This function is not available for T/TT series. (except 30i series, 0i-D/F)

content.p: Specify the library handle. See "Library handle" for details.

Specify the length of the data block (size of IODBTGI2 structure)
IODBTGI2
N is the number of the tool group to be written.

Pointer to the IODBTGI2 structure to set the tool group information. The IODBTGI2 structure is as follows.
typedef struct iodbtgi { short s_grp; /* start group number */ short dummy; /* unused */ short e_grp; /* end group number */ long opt_grpno[N]; /* optional group number */ } IODBTGI2 ; /* N is the number of tool group to be written. */
s_grp Specify the start tool group number. e_grp Specify the end tool group number. opt_grpno[i] Specify the optional group number.

item.name: EW_LENGTH
item.content:
data block length error
Size of IODBTGI2 structure(length) is wrong.

item.name: EW_NUMBER
item.content:
data number error
The specification of tool group number (s_grp,e_grp) is wrong.

item.name: EW_DATA
item.content:
data error
In order to get more information for this err_no return value, execute cnc_getdtailerr function. The following detail status will be set onto the member, err_no of ODBERR structure.
0:Completion status other than EW_DATA
1:Optional group number(opt_grpno) error
2:Optional group number(opt_grpno) has already been used
And Tool group number including incorrect data will be set onto the member, err_dtno of ODBERR.

item.name: EW_NOOPT
item.content:
no option
The tool life management B function and the extended driver/library function are necessary.(16i/18i only)
The tool life management function and the extended driver/library function is necessary.(0i-F, 30i/31i/32i only)

item.name: EW_PARAM
item.content:
parameter error(0i-F, 30i/31i/32i only)
The tool life management B function and optional group number are necessary.

item.name: EW_REJECT
item.content:
CNC execution rejected
Cannot write as the executing, selecting or buffering group.

hssb.p: The extended driver/library function are necessary.

ethr.p: The Ethernet function and the extended driver/library function are necessary.
However, in case of Series 16i/18i-B, 0i-F and 30i the required CNC option is as follows.

p.ul: above two optional functions are not required.

need.li:
Series 16i/18i
The tool life management B function.

Series 30i/31i/32i
The tool life management function.

type.li:
Series 16i/18i
This function is influenced by 512(M Series) pairs of the tool life management.

Series 0i-F, 30i
This function is influenced by additional pairs number of the tool life management.
the tool life management :256 pairs of the tool life management on whole system with M Series
additional pairs number of the tool life management:1024 pairs of the tool life management on whole system with M Series

hssb.p: The tool life management function and the extended driver/library function are necessary.
And this function is influenced by additional pairs number of the tool life management.

tr.td: 256 pairs of the tool life management on whole system with M Series
additional pairs number of the tool life management
1024 pairs of the tool life management on whole system with M Series

type.ul:
Series 16i/18i 6800#0,#1,#2 (influenced by setting)
6802#5 (Optional group number)
Series 30i/31i/32i 6800#0,#1,#2 (influenced by setting)
6805#4 (The tool life management B function)
6802#5 (Optional group number)
Series 0i-F 6800#0,#1,#2
6805#4 (The tool life management B function)
6802#5 (Optional group number)
6813
8132#0=1 (must be set)
